posts.post_content:
Look, it's the anti-[Candelabra of Tawnos](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Candelabra of Tawnos)!  
  
This is super powerful.  
Not only does it lock out their mana,  
it can actually make crap cards like [Psychic Venom](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Psychic Venom) and [Kudzu](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kudzu) (*slightly*) useful.  
  
Very cool artifact- I'm surprised this wasn't in Planar Chaos,  
given how it's a "twisted" Candelabra.
posts.html:
Look, it's the anti-Candelabra of Tawnos!

This is super powerful.

it can actually make crap cards like Psychic Venom and Kudzu (slightly) useful.

given how it's a "twisted" Candelabra.

posts.post_content: This was a one-of in my Elf ramp deck. It was great against certain control decks, but in the end it got cut for [Winter Orb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Winter Orb), even though the Orb is symmetrical, it doesn't really bother me because the majority of my mana comes from creatures, and still prevents my opponent from using wrath/counters when timed right. Regardless both cards are great at making people want to punch you, so this is a 5/5 in my book.
posts.html:
